thread.section_title: Eliseo Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good basic hotel
thread.title_full: Good basic hotel - Review of Eliseo Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: winters1
title: Good basic hotel
text:
Stayed here for 4 nights.
Room cleaned every day with fresh sheets and towels, the breakfast room on the 6th floor has lovely views and the breakfast is very good, your basic continental with pastry's also on offer, all very fresh and good quality. Nice touch that the coffee is freshly made when you arrive at breakfast and is good coffee. Staff very efficient if a little short staffed at breakfast, a lot to do for the two ladies running it. Generally I liked the hotel, only down side no bar for when you return from town but the mini bar in the room is very good value .
Harry's bar is literally 1 minute up the road, but avoid cafe veneto just down the road from Harry's bar .
